name: Forest Drum Circle: Rhythms of the Ancestors
description: Clearing under takamaka. Five hand-drums; eight clusters of fireflies pulse in rhythm. Maliya plays, Naia maps beats, Kassim emotional. Two ashy concentric ground rings. Riddle: If you can hear the fire, you can see the path.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Clearing under takamaka. Five hand-drums; eight clusters of fireflies pulse in rhythm. Maliya plays, Naia maps beats, Kassim emotional. Two ashy concentric ground rings.. Key props numeric: 5 drums, 8 fireflyClusters, 2 rings. Cipher letter: N Bearing: 150°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
